content: drops design pattern no x-460 yarn group c or a + a ------------------------------------------------------- **sizes** 26/28 - 29/31 - 32/34 - 35/37 - 38/40 - 41/43 - 44/46 = us child 9 1/2/11 - 11 1/2/12 1/2 1/3 us woman 4 1/2/6 1/2 - 7 1/2/9 1/2 10 1/2/12 1/2 - 12/13 1/2 foot length after felting 17-18-20-22-24-27-30 cm = 6 3/4 -7 -8 -8 3/4 -9 1/2 -10 5/8 -11 3/4 foot length before felting 23-24½-27-30-32½-37-40 cm = 9 -9 5/8 -10 5/8 -11 3/4 -12 3/4 -14 1/2 -15 3/4 **materials** drops alaska from garnstudio belongs to yarn group c 150-150-150-150-200-200-200 g colour 59 lemon **knitting gauge** before felting 16 stitches in width and 20 row in height with stocking stitch = 10 x 10 cm after felting approx 20 stitches in width and 27 row in height with stocking stitch = 10 x 10 cm needles drops double pointed needles size 5 5 mm drops circular needle size 5 5 mm length 40 cm or 60 cm for stocking/garter stitch
